**十字弓**（crossbow）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[发射器](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E5%99%A8 "发射器")类[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它适用于发射[弩箭](/wiki/%E5%BC%A9%E7%AE%AD "弩箭")。类似于[弓](/wiki/%E5%BC%93 "弓")和[箭](/wiki/%E7%AE%AD "箭")，你需要在[发射](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "发射 (page does not exist)")或[投掷](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%95%E6%8E%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "投掷 (page does not exist)")弩箭之前，先[持握](/index.php?title=%E6%8C%81%E6%8F%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "持握 (page does not exist)")十字弓。为十字弓附魔只增强其发射的弩箭的[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")，不会提高伤害。十字弓由[木头](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%A8%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "木头 (page does not exist)")制成。

## 生成

[侏儒](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8F%E5%84%92%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侏儒（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")会在游戏开始时获得一把+1十字弓（而不是弓）[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。十字弓和弩箭对于侏儒而言属于其[种族装备](/index.php?title=%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%E8%A3%85%E5%A4%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "种族装备 (page does not exist)")，虽然其替换机制只在侏儒游侠身上发生。

拥有武器攻击能力，能够持握武器，且没有默认[起始武器](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")的[人形](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%BA%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "人形 (page does not exist)")怪物，在生成时有概率携带十字弓（[Rogue关卡](/index.php?title=Rogue%E5%85%B3%E5%8D%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Rogue关卡 (page does not exist)")中除外）：该概率对于普通怪物而言是1⁄14，对于[领主](/index.php?title=M2_LORD/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "M2 LORD/zh-CN (page does not exist)")或[恶物](/index.php?title=%E6%81%B6%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "恶物 (page does not exist)")是1⁄12，对于[王族](/index.php?title=M2_PRINCE/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "M2 PRINCE/zh-CN (page does not exist)")怪物，或是同时为领主和恶物的怪物是1⁄10，对于同时为王族和恶物的怪物是1⁄8[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

平原[半人马](/index.php?title=%E5%8D%8A%E4%BA%BA%E9%A9%AC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "半人马 (page does not exist)")和山半人马生成时有1⁄2的概率获得一把十字弓和3～14支弩箭[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 十字弓技能

| 十字弓  |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 最大等级 | [角色](/index.php?title=%E8%A7%92%E8%89%B2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "角色 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| 基础   | - [僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")、[牧师](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A7%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "牧师 (page does not exist)")、[游客](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游客 (page does not exist)") |
| 熟练   | * [骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| 老练   | - [盗贼](/index.php?title=%E7%9B%97%E8%B4%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "盗贼 (page does not exist)")、[游侠](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠 (page does not exist)")                                                                                              |

十字弓是唯一使用十字弓技能的发射器，[弩箭](/wiki/%E5%BC%A9%E7%AE%AD "弩箭")是唯一使用十字弓技能的发射物。游戏中没有[神器类](/index.php?title=%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "神器武器 (page does not exist)")十字弓。

## 描述

不同于其他射程同[力量](/index.php?title=%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "力量 (page does not exist)")相关的[远程武器](/wiki/%E8%BF%9C%E7%A8%8B%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "远程武器")，十字弓的射程固定为8格。但如果使用者的力量低于一定阈值，使用十字弓会受到[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")惩罚：若你是侏儒，你需要在力量值达到16时才能获得完全的多重射击加成；若你是其他种族，则需要力量值达到18才能避免多重射击惩罚。不是[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")或[巫师](/index.php?title=%E5%B7%AB%E5%B8%88\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "巫师 (page does not exist)")的侏儒玩家使用十字弓发射弩箭时会获得+1多重射击加成。

## 策略

没有远程武器的高力量值角色可以考虑从[侏儒矿坑](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8F%E5%84%92%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侏儒矿坑 (page does not exist)")获取十字弓。不过，箭可以从[箭陷阱](/index.php?title=%E7%AE%AD%E9%99%B7%E9%98%B1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "箭陷阱 (page does not exist)")获取，弩箭的获取来源就相对少一些。和大多数发射器一样，若你需要提升弩箭的威力，你需要[附魔](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武器附魔卷轴 (page does not exist)")弩箭本身而不是附魔十字弓。十字弓的附魔仅影响其射击命中。

挑战[无近战武器](/index.php?title=%E6%97%A0%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "无近战武器 (page does not exist)")行为的[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")可以使用十字弓作为主要攻击手段。盗贼可以将十字弓技能锻炼到老练等级，因此可以选择十字弓作为长期使用的远程武器。

侏儒游侠在游戏早期可以从其他[侏儒](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%8F%E5%84%92%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E7%B1%BB%E5%88%AB%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侏儒（怪物类别） (page does not exist)")身上获取更多的弩箭，不过需要优先派遣[宠物](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "宠物 (page does not exist)")去击杀其他侏儒，以避免[阵营值](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B5%E8%90%A5%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "阵营值 (page does not exist)")惩罚。[游侠任务](/index.php?title=%E6%B8%B8%E4%BE%A0%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "游侠任务 (page does not exist)")中生成的半人马在游戏中期能提供大量的弩箭，但若你没有[反射](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%8D%E5%B0%84\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "反射 (page does not exist)")或合适的抗性，它们携带的攻击型[魔杖](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%9D%96\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔杖 (page does not exist)")也会造成威胁。任务奖励的[神器](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%BB%E5%8A%A1%E7%A5%9E%E5%99%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "任务神器 (page does not exist)")是[戴安娜的长弓](/index.php?title=%E6%88%B4%E5%AE%89%E5%A8%9C%E7%9A%84%E9%95%BF%E5%BC%93\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "戴安娜的长弓 (page does not exist)")，并不使用十字弓的技能和弹药，因此侏儒游侠或许最好继续带着十字弓和高附魔弩箭作为主要的远程攻击手段，只将长弓作为[心灵感应](/index.php?title=%E5%BF%83%E7%81%B5%E6%84%9F%E5%BA%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "心灵感应 (page does not exist)")来源带在身上。

## 历史

十字弓和弩箭自[Jay Fenlason's Hack](/wiki/Jay_Fenlason%27s_Hack "Jay Fenlason's Hack")的变体Hack 1.21开始就存在于游戏中。十字弓的专属射程和多重射击机制自[NetHack 3.6.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.0 "NetHack 3.6.0")开始加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Crossbow/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), crossbows are [two-handed](/wiki/Two-handed "Two-handed") weapons. SLASH'EM also introduces an artifact crossbow, [Hellfire](/wiki/Hellfire "Hellfire"), that is [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic")-aligned and provides [fire resistance](/wiki/Fire_resistance "Fire resistance") when wielded; bolts fired from it that hit monsters create a fiery explosion in a 3x3 square centered on that monster.

[Undead Slayers](/wiki/Undead_Slayer "Undead Slayer") have a chance of starting the game with a crossbow and bolts.

### GruntHack

In [GruntHack](/wiki/GruntHack "GruntHack"), crossbows now fire a set range regardless of strength, and require high strength to fire multiple shots.

### dNetHack

[dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack") add the [droven crossbow](/wiki/Droven_crossbow "Droven crossbow") as a weapon that uses the crossbow skill.

All gnomish characters in roles that start with a bow and arrows are given a crossbow and bolts, and all gnomes get an extra die of weapon damage when firing bolts from crossbows - they can also reach Expert skill in crossbow.

[Astaroth](/wiki/Astaroth "Astaroth") is a [spirit](/wiki/Spirits_\(dNetHack\) "Spirits (dNetHack)") that grants skill in crossbows while bound.

Each shot from a crossbow applies a 3x damage bonus based on current skill level: -5 at Restricted, -2 at Unskilled, +0 at Basic, +2 at Skilled and +5 at Expert. Higher skill levels also apply damage increases for each fired bolt instead of multishot:

- Basic or lower: 1x(bolt+enchantment) damage
- Skilled: 2x(bolt+enchantment) damage
- Expert: 3x(bolt+enchantment) damage

The extra damage is precision-based and does not apply against monsters that are amorphous or stationary, or ones that are incorporeal (as they are assumed to lack discernible weak-points).

There are three artifact crossbows:

- [The Rogue Gear-Spirits](/wiki/The_Rogue_Gear-Spirits "The Rogue Gear-Spirits"), which replaces The Longbow of Diana as the [quest artifact](/wiki/Quest_artifact "Quest artifact") for the [Gnomish Ranger Quest](/wiki/Gnomish_Ranger_Quest "Gnomish Ranger Quest").
- [Hellfire](/wiki/Hellfire_\(dNetHack\) "Hellfire (dNetHack)"), which is similar to its SLASH'EM incarnation and grants fire resistance alongside firing explosive bolts.
- [The Unstoppable](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Unstoppable "DNetHack artifacts"), which causes fired bolts to pierce through hostile monsters on hit, and bolts that miss will continue flying until they hit a wall.

### NetHack Fourk

In [NetHack Fourk](/wiki/NetHack_Fourk "NetHack Fourk"), gnomes have increased skill caps for crossbows.

### SpliceHack

In [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"), [merfolk](/wiki/Merfolk_\(starting_race\) "Merfolk (starting race)") characters in roles that would start the game with a bow and arrows receive a crossbow and bolts instead.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), Monks no longer have the crossbow skill available; [centaurs](/wiki/Centaur_\(starting_race\) "Centaur (starting race)") gain a +1 multishot bonus when using crossbows. This means that centaur Monks can still fire 2 crossbow bolts per shot despite the skill being restricted.

Gnomish Rangers have their quest artifact changed to [The Crossbow of Carl](/wiki/The_Crossbow_of_Carl "The Crossbow of Carl"), which is an artifact crossbow that mirrors The Longbow of Diana given to other Rangers. This allows them to preserve their multishot bonuses while also giving access to an unlimited source of crossbow bolts.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [Warriors](/wiki/Warrior "Warrior") start each game with a +1 crossbow and a stack of +0 crossbow bolts; Undead Slayers now have a 1⁄2 chance of start with a crossbow and some bolts. All player gnomes are capable of reaching skilled in crossbows.

[Player monster](/wiki/Player_monster "Player monster") undead slayers and gnomish non-[Cavemen](/wiki/Cavemen "Cavemen") are likely to generate with a crossbow and some bolts.

十字弓（crossbow）是NetHack中的一种发射器类武器。它适用于发射弩箭。类似于弓和箭，你需要在发射或投掷弩箭之前，先持握十字弓。为十字弓附魔只增强其发射的弩箭的命中，不会提高伤害。十字弓由木头制成。

生成

侏儒族游侠会在游戏开始时获得一把+1十字弓（而不是弓）[1][2]。十字弓和弩箭对于侏儒而言属于其种族装备，虽然其替换机制只在侏儒游侠身上发生。

拥有武器攻击能力，能够持握武器，且没有默认起始武器的人形怪物，在生成时有概率携带十字弓（Rogue关卡中除外）：该概率对于普通怪物而言是1⁄14，对于领主或恶物是1⁄12，对于王族怪物，或是同时为领主和恶物的怪物是1⁄10，对于同时为王族和恶物的怪物是1⁄8[3]。

平原半人马和山半人马生成时有1⁄2的概率获得一把十字弓和3～14支弩箭[4]。

十字弓技能

十字弓

十字弓是唯一使用十字弓技能的发射器，弩箭是唯一使用十字弓技能的发射物。游戏中没有神器类十字弓。

描述

不同于其他射程同力量相关的远程武器，十字弓的射程固定为8格。但如果使用者的力量低于一定阈值，使用十字弓会受到多重射击惩罚：若你是侏儒，你需要在力量值达到16时才能获得完全的多重射击加成；若你是其他种族，则需要力量值达到18才能避免多重射击惩罚。不是医生或巫师的侏儒玩家使用十字弓发射弩箭时会获得+1多重射击加成。

策略

没有远程武器的高力量值角色可以考虑从侏儒矿坑获取十字弓。不过，箭可以从箭陷阱获取，弩箭的获取来源就相对少一些。和大多数发射器一样，若你需要提升弩箭的威力，你需要附魔弩箭本身而不是附魔十字弓。十字弓的附魔仅影响其射击命中。

挑战无近战武器行为的僧侣可以使用十字弓作为主要攻击手段。盗贼可以将十字弓技能锻炼到老练等级，因此可以选择十字弓作为长期使用的远程武器。

侏儒游侠在游戏早期可以从其他侏儒身上获取更多的弩箭，不过需要优先派遣宠物去击杀其他侏儒，以避免阵营值惩罚。游侠任务中生成的半人马在游戏中期能提供大量的弩箭，但若你没有反射或合适的抗性，它们携带的攻击型魔杖也会造成威胁。任务奖励的神器是戴安娜的长弓，并不使用十字弓的技能和弹药，因此侏儒游侠或许最好继续带着十字弓和高附魔弩箭作为主要的远程攻击手段，只将长弓作为心灵感应来源带在身上。

历史

十字弓和弩箭自Jay Fenlason's Hack的变体Hack 1.21开始就存在于游戏中。十字弓的专属射程和多重射击机制自NetHack 3.6.0开始加入游戏。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, crossbows are two-handed weapons. SLASH'EM also introduces an artifact crossbow, Hellfire, that is chaotic-aligned and provides fire resistance when wielded; bolts fired from it that hit monsters create a fiery explosion in a 3x3 square centered on that monster.

Undead Slayers have a chance of starting the game with a crossbow and bolts.

GruntHack

In GruntHack, crossbows now fire a set range regardless of strength, and require high strength to fire multiple shots.

dNetHack

dNetHack and notdNetHack add the droven crossbow as a weapon that uses the crossbow skill.

All gnomish characters in roles that start with a bow and arrows are given a crossbow and bolts, and all gnomes get an extra die of weapon damage when firing bolts from crossbows - they can also reach Expert skill in crossbow.

Astaroth is a spirit that grants skill in crossbows while bound.

Each shot from a crossbow applies a 3x damage bonus based on current skill level: -5 at Restricted, -2 at Unskilled, +0 at Basic, +2 at Skilled and +5 at Expert. Higher skill levels also apply damage increases for each fired bolt instead of multishot:

  • Basic or lower: 1x(bolt+enchantment) damage
  • Skilled: 2x(bolt+enchantment) damage
  • Expert: 3x(bolt+enchantment) damage

The extra damage is precision-based and does not apply against monsters that are amorphous or stationary, or ones that are incorporeal (as they are assumed to lack discernible weak-points).

There are three artifact crossbows:

  • The Rogue Gear-Spirits, which replaces The Longbow of Diana as the quest artifact for the Gnomish Ranger Quest.
  • Hellfire, which is similar to its SLASH'EM incarnation and grants fire resistance alongside firing explosive bolts.
  • The Unstoppable, which causes fired bolts to pierce through hostile monsters on hit, and bolts that miss will continue flying until they hit a wall.

NetHack Fourk

In NetHack Fourk, gnomes have increased skill caps for crossbows.

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, merfolk characters in roles that would start the game with a bow and arrows receive a crossbow and bolts instead.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, Monks no longer have the crossbow skill available; centaurs gain a +1 multishot bonus when using crossbows. This means that centaur Monks can still fire 2 crossbow bolts per shot despite the skill being restricted.

Gnomish Rangers have their quest artifact changed to The Crossbow of Carl, which is an artifact crossbow that mirrors The Longbow of Diana given to other Rangers. This allows them to preserve their multishot bonuses while also giving access to an unlimited source of crossbow bolts.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, Warriors start each game with a +1 crossbow and a stack of +0 crossbow bolts; Undead Slayers now have a 1⁄2 chance of start with a crossbow and some bolts. All player gnomes are capable of reaching skilled in crossbows.

Player monster undead slayers and gnomish non-Cavemen are likely to generate with a crossbow and some bolts.

'''十字弓'''（crossbow）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[发射器]]类[[武器]]。它适用于发射[[弩箭]]。类似于[[弓]]和[[箭]]，你需要在[[发射]]或[[投掷]]弩箭之前，先[[持握]]十字弓。为十字弓附魔只增强其发射的弩箭的[[命中]]，不会提高伤害。十字弓由[[木头]]制成。

== 生成 ==

拥有武器攻击能力，能够持握武器，且没有默认[[怪物起始物品|起始武器]]的[[人形]]怪物，在生成时有概率携带十字弓（[[Rogue关卡]]中除外）：该概率对于普通怪物而言是{{frac|14}}，对于[[M2_LORD/zh-CN|领主]]或[[恶物]]是{{frac|12}}，对于[[M2_PRINCE/zh-CN|王族]]怪物，或是同时为领主和恶物的怪物是{{frac|10}}，对于同时为王族和恶物的怪物是{{frac|8}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|529|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

平原[[半人马]]和山半人马生成时有{{frac|2}}的概率获得一把十字弓和{{rn1|12|3|{{波浪线}}}}支弩箭{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|466|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。
